name: real-estate-app
description: Aplicación completa de bienes raíces con backend .NET y frontend Next.js

scripts.dev: bun run --bun concurrently "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.start: bun run --bun concurrently "bun run start:backend" "bun run start:frontend"
scripts.clean: bun run clean:backend && bun run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules && bun install

author: Real Estate Development Team
